QuestData.Title: Allies in Death
QuestData.Description:
Our power alone may not be enough to fight the behemoth, Geir. Fortunately, Faljar was kind enough to send our allies into Helheim with us.
Earlier, I had discovered several of them being tortured by the elemental forces of Helheim. You may think the dead can't drown, but with Helya's power, this is not the case.
I could not release them then, but now that you possess the waylight, you may be able to.
Seek them out and free them from an eternity of suffering!
QuestData.CompletionText: Once unbound, my Valkyra will throttle these wretched minions.
QuestData.RewardText: It is good to have my shieldmaidens returned to my side. $B$BYou have gained allies today, but know you have also gained my gratitude.
